#summary How to deploy and run dnsperf

==Dependencies==
 * bind9utils
 * lbbind-dev
 * libssl-dev
 * libcap-dev
 * linkrb5-dev
 * libxml2-dev

==COMPILE / INSTALL==
{{{
./configure; make; sudo make install
}}}

==RUN==
{{{
dnsperf -d testfile -n <times_to_repeat_testfile> -s <server_ip> -c <number_of_clients_to_acts_as>
}}}
